General.Name: Blue Thunder Mining Inc
General.Description: Blue Thunder Mining Inc., a mineral exploration company, focuses on identification, evaluation, acquisition, and exploration of gold and base metal properties in Canada. The company holds a 100% interest in the Muus project that covers approximately 52,000 hectares located in the southern part of the James Bay area of the Province of Quebec. Blue Thunder Mining Inc. is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 401 Bay Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 2Y4
